price: Ndërsa, ata që përpiqen t’i luftojnë shpalljet Tona, ata do të dënohen.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yasʿawna fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
